   pūrva ācāryaiḥ paribhāṣitam /	pUrva AcAryEH pariBAzitam /

   sahārthaṃ brūtaḥ iti /	saha arTam brUtaH iti /

   anyaḥ iti śāstra apekṣayā loko vyapadiśyate /	anyaH iti SAstra  apekzayA lokaH vyapadiSyate /

   aśālā ca || PS_2,4.24 ||	aSAlA ca || PS_2,4.24 ||
   _____START JKv_2,4.24:	_____START JKu _2,4.24:
   aśālā ca yā sabhā tadantas tatpuruṣo napuṃsaka liṅgo bhavati /	aSAlA ca yA saBA tad antar tatpuruzaH napuMsaka liFgaH Bavati /

   vibhāṣā senā surā cchāyā śālā niśānām || PS_2,4.25 ||	viBAzA senA  surA = CAyA  SAlA  niSAnAm || PS_2,4.25 ||

   samāhāra dvandve napuṃsaka liṅgasya vihitatvād	samAhAra  dvandve napuMsaka liFgasya vihita tvAt

   parataḥ /	paratas /
   ābhyāṃ chātrābhyaṃ rātriradhītā, atho ābhyāmaharapyadhītam /	AByAm CAtra aByam rAtriH aDItA, aTo AByAm ahar api aDItam /

   tad asya parimāṇam (*5,1.47) iti vartate /	tat asya parimANam (*5,1.47) iti vartate /
   paṅktyādayaḥ śabdā nipātyante /	paFkti AdayaH SabdAH nipAtyante /
   yad iha lakṣaṇena anupapannaṃ tat sarvaṃ nipātanāt siddham /	yat iha lakzaNena anupapannam tat sarvam nipAtanAt sidDam /
   pañcānā ṭilopaḥ tiś ca pratyayaḥ /	paQcAnA wilopaH tiH ca pratyayaH /
   pañca parimāṇam asya paṅktiś chandaḥ /	paQca parimANam asya paFktiH CandaH /
   dvayor daśatoḥ vinbhāvaḥ śatiś ca pratyayaḥ dvau daśatau praimāṇam asya	dvayoH daSatoH vinBAvaH SatiH ca pratyayaH dvO daSatO prEmANam asya
   saṅghasya viṃśatiḥ /	saFGasya viMSatiH /

   pañcānāṃ daśatāṃ pañcābhāvaḥ śat ca pratyayaḥ /	paQcAnAm daSatAm paQca aBAvaH Sat ca pratyayaH /
   pañca daśataḥ parimāṇām asya pañcāśat /	paQca daSatas parimANAm asya paQcASat /
   ṣaṇṇāṃ daśatāṃ ṣaḍbhāvaḥ, tiḥ pratyayo 'padatvaṃ ca /	zaNNAm daSatAm zaz BAvaH, tiH pratyayaH apadatvam ca /
   ṣaṅ daśataḥ parimāṇam asya ṣaṣṭiḥ /	zaF daSatas parimANam asya zazwiH /
   saptānāṃ daśatāṃ saptabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /	saptAnAm daSatAm sapta BAvaH tiH pratyayaH ca /
   sapta daśataḥ parimāṇam asya saptatiḥ /	sapta daSatas parimANam asya saptatiH /
   aṣṭānāṃ daśatām aśībhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /	azwAnAm daSatAm aSIBAvaH tiH pratyayaH ca /
   aṣṭau daśataḥ parimāṇam asya aśītiḥ /	azwO daSatas parimANam asya aSItiH /
   navānāṃ daśatāṃ navabhāvaḥ tiḥ pratyayaś ca /	navAnAm daSatAm nava BAvaH tiH pratyayaH ca /
   nava daśataḥ parimāṇam asya navatiḥ /	nava daSatas parimANam asya navatiH /
   daśanāṃ daśatāṃ śabhāvaḥ taś ca pratyayaḥ /	daSanAm daSatAm SaBAvaH taH ca pratyayaH /
   daśa daśataḥ parimāṇam asya saṅghasya śatam /	daSa daSatas parimANam asya saFGasya Satam /
   viṃśatyādayo guṇa śabdāḥ, te yathā kathaṃcid vyutpādyāḥ /	viMSati AdayaH guNa  SabdAH, te yaTA kaTaMcid vyutpAdyAH /
   na atra avayavārthe 'bhiniveṣṭavyam /	na atra avayava arTe aBinivezwavyam /
   tathā hi   paṅktiḥ iti kramasamniveśe 'pi vartate, brāhmaṇapaṅktiḥ,	taTA hi  paFktiH iti krama samniveSe api vartate, brAhmaNa paFktiH,
   papīlikāpaṅktiḥ iti /	papIlikA paFktiH iti /
   na ca atra avayavārthaḥ kaścid asti /	na ca atra avayava arTaH kaScid asti /
   yā ca+eṣāṃ viṣayabhedena guṇa mātre guṇini ca vṛttiḥ,	yA ca+ezAm vizaya Bedena guNa  mAtre guNini ca vRttiH,
   svaliṅga saṅkhya anuvidhānaṃ ca, etad api sarvaṃ svābhāvikam eva /	sva liFga  saFKya  anuviDAnam ca, etat api sarvam svABAvikam eva /

   tathā ca vyutpatter aniyamaṃ darśayati /	taTA ca vyutpatteH aniyamam darSayati /
   indra śabdāt ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt liṅgam ity etasminn arthe ghac pratyayo	indra  SabdAt zazWI samarTAt liFgam iti etasmin arTe Gac pratyayo
   bhavati /	Bavati /
   indrasy liṅgam indriyam /	indrasi liFgam indriyam /
   indra ātmā, sa cakṣurādinā karaṇena anumīyate /	indraH AtmA, sa cakzuH AdinA karaNena anumIyate /
   nākartṛkaṃ karaṇam asti /	na akartRkam karaNam asti /
   indreṇa dṛṣṭam /	indreNa dRzwam /
   tṛtīyāsamarthāt pratyayaḥ /	tRtIyA samarTAt pratyayaH /
   ātmanā dṛṣṭam ity arthaḥ /	AtmanA dRzwam iti arTaH /
   indreṇa sṛṣṭam, ātmanā sṛṣṭam /	indreNa sRzwam, AtmanA sRzwam /
   tatkṛtena śubhāśubhakarmaṇotpannam iti kṛtvā /	tad kRtena SuBa aSuBa karmaNA utpannam iti kRtvA /
   indreṇa juṣṭam, ātmanā juṣṭaṃ, sevitam /	indreNa juzwam, AtmanA juzwaM, sevitam /
   taddvāreṇa vijñānotpādanāt /	tad dvAreNa vijQAna utpAdanAt /
   indreṇa dattam, ātmanā viṣayebhyo dattaṃ yathāyathaṃ grahaṇāya /	indreNa dattam, AtmanA vizayeByaH dattam yaTAyaTam grahaNAya /
   itikaraṇaḥ prakārārthaḥ /	iti karaNaH prakAra arTaH /
   sati sambhave vyutpattir anyathā 'pi kartavyā, rūḍheraniyamāt iti /	sati samBave vyutpattiH anyaTA api kartavyA, rUXeH aniyamAt iti /
   vāśabdaḥ pratyekam abhisambadhyamāno vikalpānāṃ svātantryam darśayati //	vA SabdaH pratyekam aBisambaDyamAnaH vikalpAnAm svAtantryam darSayati //
   tad asya asty asminn iti matup || PS_5,2.94 ||	tat asya asti asmin iti matuB || PS_5,2.94 ||

   tadādividhiś ca atra bhavati /	tad Adi viDiH ca atra Bavati /

   sauvaraḥ adhyāyaḥ, sauvaryaḥ saptamyaḥ iti /	sOvaraH aDyAyaH, sOvaryaH saptamyaH iti /

   svargamanam āha sauvargamanikaḥ /	svar gamanam Aha sOvargamanikaH /
   svādhyāya iti kecit paṭhanti, tadanarthakam /	svADyAyaH iti kecid paWanti, tad anarTakam /

   akriyamāṇe grahaṇe visarjanīyas tadā viśeṣyeta /	akriyamANe grahaNe visarjanIyaH tadA viSezyeta /

   prakṛtaṃ padaṃ tadantaṃ tasya api viśeṣaṇaṃ nyāyyam //	prakRtam padam tad antam tasya api viSezaNam nyAyyam //
   evaṃ tu kriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe catuḥśabdasya kṛtvo 'rthe 'pi	evam tu kriyamANe dvis tris catur grahaNe catur Sabdasya kRtvas arTe api
   vartamanasya pūrveṇa+eva nityaṃ ṣatvaṃ syāt /	varta manasya pUrveNa+A iva nityam zatvam syAt /
   pūrvatra siddhe na asti vipratiṣedho 'bhāvād uttarasya //	pUrvatra sidDe na asti vipratizeDaH aBAvAt uttarasya //
